attributes.action: Stop jumping on the green bandwagon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Green issues are valid but the latest proposals to ban existing light bulbs etc will cause untold financial harm to millions of households.  Don't just jump on the bandwwagon but fully research the issues before making committments.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
